The game is very intuitive and has different levels. It appeals to everyone, and the challenges are increasingly challenging. Every time you lose, you want to try again.
The soundtrack is very good and doesn't irritate during gameplay.
The ease of controls should appeal to all types of players.
Hyper Space is a great game, the kind you play when you're short on time but want to have some fun.
Looking forward to the mobile version.

column8:
Acabei de finalizar o modo hist√≥ria e achei bem interessante o jogo num geral. A movimenta√ß√£o que para mim √© o ponto forte a ponto de sempre querer me mexer pelo board o tempo todo. Os gr√°ficos est√£o √≥timos e muito bem feitos, isso vale para os VFX's e toda a trilha sonora que da um PLUS em toda a experiencia.

Pontos Positivos:
1 - Movimenta√ß√£o prazerosa.
2 - Gr√°ficos muito bem feitos.
3 - Trilha sonora Exepcional.
4 - Ilustra√ß√µes lindas.
5 - VFX bem feitos.

Pontos a se melhorar:
1 - O boss ter apenas um tipo de ataque √© meio anti climax, toda a dificuldade do level final s√£o os outros desafios o boss n√£o tr√°s perigo nenhum para fase, sendo facilmente de desviar dele.
2 - A anima√ß√£o do boss poderia ser um pouco mais fluida.
3 - A entrada do boss poderia ser um pouco mais impactante.
4 - O texto com os objetivos antes de come√ßar a fase tem uma menor se comparada com os de dentro da fase.

Ponto negativo:
1 - A voz que fala "go", "mission failed" tem uma qualidade muito inferior se comparada com o resto do jogo.

O jogo est√° muito bem feito e entrega completamente tudo oque √© prometido, super recomendo.
column9:
I just finished the story mode and found the game overall very interesting. For me, the movement is its strong point, making me want to move around the board all the time. The graphics are excellent and very well done, as are the VFX and the soundtrack, which adds a plus to the entire experience.

Positive Points:
1 - Pleasant movement.
2 - Very well-done graphics.
3 - Exceptional soundtrack.
4 - Beautiful illustrations.
5 - Well-done VFX.

Points for improvement:
1 - The boss having only one type of attack is a bit of an anticlimax. The final level's difficulty lies in the other challenges. The boss poses no threat to the stage and is easily dodged.
2 - The boss's animation could be a little more fluid.
3 - The boss's entrance could be a little more impactful. 4 - The text with objectives before starting the level is shorter compared to the text within the level.

Negative points:
1 - The voice that says "go" or "mission failed" is of much lower quality compared to the rest of the game.

The game is very well made and completely delivers on its promises. I highly recommend it.

column8:
[h1]Analysis[/h1]:
The game has a very simple gameloop, which is enjoyable in most of the parts. The game needs to be optimized, sometimes the game just froze in some parts, nothing that impacted the gameplay. Overall is a very fun game, you can spend hours trying to complete the history mode. The arcade mode is very challenging too, most of the time that I played was on arcade mode.
[h1]Feedback for Developers[/h1]:
[olist]
    [*]Making the ship to move faster (by faster I mean smoothier) would improve the gameplay.
    [*]I found confusing the disposition in the main menu, I found the history mode by accident.
[/olist]

column8: No cen√°rio atual em que vemos cada vez mais jogos querendo implementar o maior n√∫mero de mec√¢nicas poss√≠vel para dar a ilus√£o de profundidade, √© muito bom ter um jogo como esse, que d√° foco absoluto ao elemento de sua gameplay que o torna mais divertido e viciante, desenvolvendo-o ao m√°ximo. √â o tipo de jogo que voc√™ pode abrir e come√ßar a se entreter imediatamente, sem precisar se preocupar com dezenas de menus e stats; √© um al√≠vio, j√° que nossa rotina j√° √© complicada o suficiente.
column9: In today's world, where we see more and more games trying to implement as many mechanics as possible to create the illusion of depth, it's great to have a game like this, which gives absolute focus to the gameplay element that makes it most fun and addictive, developing it to its fullest. It's the kind of game you can open and start playing right away, without having to worry about dozens of menus and stats; it's a relief, since our daily lives are already complicated enough.

column8:
O jogo se destaca por oferecer uma gameplay simples, intuitiva e acess√≠vel para pessoas PCD, utilizando apenas os direcionais como forma de navegar pelo quadrante. Essa simplicidade se torna complexa a medida que se progride, com uma alta curva de aprendizagem que requer insist√™ncia nos n√≠veis mais altos. 
Hyper Space √© um jogo que indico para se jogar casualmente, especialmente entre amigos no modo multiplayer local ou via Remote Play, sendo praticamente um jogo obrigat√≥rio para quem tem Steam Deck. 

+ Trilha musical complementa o clima e efeitos sonoros remetem aos cl√°ssicos.
+ Anima√ß√µes caprichadas e visual estiloso, com cutscenes divertidas.
+ Jogabilidade divertida no modo competitivo
+ Batalhas com chefes s√£o intensas e criativas
-  Aus√™ncia de sele√ß√£o de dificuldade, podendo ser frustrante para jogadores menos insistentes
- Uma tabela de High Score global seria estimulante para f√£s do g√™nero
column9:
The game stands out for offering simple, intuitive, and accessible gameplay for people with disabilities, using only the directional pads to navigate the quadrant. This simplicity becomes complex as you progress, with a steep learning curve that requires persistence at higher levels.

Hyper Space is a game I recommend for casual play, especially with friends in local multiplayer or via Remote Play, and is practically a must-have for Steam Deck owners.

+ The soundtrack complements the atmosphere, and the sound effects evoke classics.
+ The neat animations and stylish visuals, with fun cutscenes.
+ Fun gameplay in competitive mode
+ Boss battles are intense and creative
- Lack of difficulty selection, which can be frustrating for less persistent players
- A global high score table would be encouraging for fans of the genre

column8:
Very good game, lots of fun and pretty adctive.

Some things made the story mode too hard.

Level 2 has very little time for the 50 stars needed to complete. If you take your time and play safe, you won't have enough time to finish the level.

Level 5 is pretty cool, the big monster is really cool looking. The only thing was that sometimes the stars spawn in his area, and it is impossible to complete combos, could have a detection on where the stars are spawning to prevent it.

Other than that, had a lot of fun, used all my breaks at work to play and finish the story mode.

Level 3 with the UFO is pretty cool, and really gets you moving if you weren't already.

I'll look for someone to player multiplayer with, and add to this review.

Great job guys, looking forward to see new games in the future.
